generation.key:
Name
Type
Cat.
Power
Acc.
PP
Effect

move.name: Aromatic Mist
move.desc: Raises Special Defense of an ally.

move.name: Baby-Doll Eyes
move.desc: Always goes first. Lowers the target's attack.

move.name: Belch
move.desc: User must have consumed a Berry.

move.name: Boomburst
move.desc: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

move.name: Celebrate
move.desc: The Pokémon congratulates you on your special day. No battle effect.

move.name: Confide
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Crafty Shield
move.desc: Protects the Pokémon from status moves.

move.name: Dazzling Gleam
move.desc: Hits all adjacent opponents.

move.name: Diamond Storm
move.desc: May sharply raise user's Defense.

move.name: Disarming Voice
move.desc: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

move.name: Dragon Ascent
move.desc: Lowers user's Defense and Special Defense.

move.name: Draining Kiss
move.desc: User recovers most the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Eerie Impulse
move.desc: Sharply lowers opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Electric Terrain
move.desc: Prevents all Pokémon from falling asleep for 5 turns.

move.name: Electrify
move.desc: Changes the target's move to Electric type.

move.name: Fairy Lock
move.desc: Prevents fleeing in the next turn.

move.name: Fell Stinger
move.desc: Drastically raises user's Attack if target is KO'd.

move.name: Flower Shield
move.desc: Sharply raises Defense of all Grass-type Pokémon on the field.

move.name: Flying Press
move.desc: Deals Fighting and Flying type damage.

move.name: Forest's Curse
move.desc: Adds Grass type to opponent.

move.name: Freeze-Dry
move.desc: May freeze opponent. Super-effective against Water types.

move.name: Geomancy
move.desc: Charges on first turn, sharply raises user's Sp. Attack, Sp. Defense and Speed on the second.

move.name: Grassy Terrain
move.desc: Restores a little HP of all Pokémon for 5 turns.

move.name: Happy Hour
move.desc: Doubles prize money from trainer battles.

move.name: Hold Back
move.desc: Always leaves opponent with at least 1 HP.

move.name: Hold Hands
move.desc: Makes the user and an ally very happy.

move.name: Hyperspace Fury
move.desc: Lowers user's Defense. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Hyperspace Hole
move.desc: Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Infestation
move.desc: Traps opponent, damaging them for 4-5 turns.

move.name: Ion Deluge
move.desc: Changes Normal-type moves to Electric-type.

move.name: King's Shield
move.desc: Protects the user and lowers opponent's Attack on contact.

move.name: Light of Ruin
move.desc: User receives recoil damage.

move.name: Magnetic Flux
move.desc: Raises Defense and Sp. Defense of Plus/Minus Pokémon.

move.name: Mat Block
move.desc: Protects teammates from damaging moves.

move.name: Misty Terrain
move.desc: Protects the field from status conditions for 5 turns.

move.name: Moonblast
move.desc: May lower opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Mystical Fire
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Special Attack.

move.name: Noble Roar
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack.

move.name: Nuzzle
move.desc: Paralyzes opponent.

move.name: Oblivion Wing
move.desc: User recovers most of the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Origin Pulse
move.desc: Hits all adjacent opponents.

move.name: Parabolic Charge
move.desc: User recovers half the HP inflicted on opponent.

move.name: Parting Shot
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Attack and Special Attack then switches out.

move.name: Petal Blizzard
move.desc: Hits all adjacent Pokémon.

move.name: Phantom Force
move.desc: Disappears on first turn, attacks on second. Can strike through Protect/Detect.

move.name: Play Nice
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Attack. Always hits.

move.name: Play Rough
move.desc: May lower opponent's Attack.

move.name: Powder
move.desc: Damages Pokémon using Fire type moves.

move.name: Power-Up Punch
move.desc: Raises Attack.

move.name: Precipice Blades
move.desc: Hits all adjacent opponents.

move.name: Rototiller
move.desc: Raises Attack and Special Attack of Grass-types.

move.name: Spiky Shield
move.desc: Protects the user and inflicts damage on contact.

move.name: Steam Eruption
move.desc: May burn opponent.

move.name: Sticky Web
move.desc: Lowers opponent's Speed when switching into battle.

move.name: Thousand Arrows
move.desc: Makes Flying-type Pokémon vulnerable to Ground moves.

move.name: Thousand Waves
move.desc: Opponent cannot flee or switch.

move.name: Topsy-Turvy
move.desc: Reverses stat changes of opponent.

move.name: Trick-or-Treat
move.desc: Adds Ghost type to opponent.

move.name: Venom Drench
move.desc: Lowers poisoned opponent's Special Attack and Speed.

move.name: Water Shuriken
move.desc: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.
